title: PRD: Molty Dashboard
content:
# PRD: Molty Dashboard

**Version:** 1.0
**Created:** 2026-02-02
**Author:** Molty + Juli
**Status:** Draft

## Overview

A personal dashboard to track what Molty (AI assistant) and Juli are working on together — tasks, projects, costs, and activity over time.

## Goals

1. **Task Tracking** — See active projects, completed tasks, and backlog
2. **Cost Visibility** — Track AI token usage and estimated costs
3. **Activity Feed** — Real-time or near-real-time log of Molty's actions
4. **Project Organization** — Group tasks by client/project (Coconut Breeze, Brand Filtr, etc.)

## Features

### MVP (Phase 1)
- Project List
- Task Board
- Activity Log
- Cost Tracker
- Manual Task Entry

### Future (Phase 2)
- Calendar Integration
- Automated Task Creation
- Client Portal
- Time Tracking

title: Travel Tech Briefing - Feb 2, 2026
content:
# Travel Tech Briefing — Feb 2, 2026

## Headlines

• AI platforms projected to capture 50% of travel search this year
• Virgin Atlantic adding real-time voice AI concierge
• OpenAI + Booking.com launch SME AI accelerator in Europe
• ITB Berlin's Travel Tech Track next month showcasing autonomous booking systems

## Blog Post Angles

1. **LinkedIn hot takes** — Pick one headline, add your perspective
2. **Blog post:** "What Virgin Atlantic's Voice AI Means for Customer Experience"
3. **Blog post:** "SMEs + AI: What the Booking.com Accelerator Signals"
4. **Blog post:** "Autonomous Booking Systems: Hype vs. Reality"

## Recommended Action

Pick the AI search stat (most impactful), write a 3-paragraph LinkedIn post with your take on what travel businesses should do now.
